title: A Belfast Artist Helps Make Big Movies
summary: James Carson is a creative person from Belfast who now works on big movies. He used to deliver packages for an animation company, but he worked hard and learned new skills. Now, he helps make 3D computer graphics for films like Mulan and Spider-man. He was also a key player in making KPop Demon Hunters, a movie that won a Golden Globe and became very popular worldwide. Carson wants to inspire young people to become animators too. He says there are more job options now because of new companies and artificial intelligence. He recently showed KPop Demon Hunters in Belfast at a festival called RENDR, where people could see how animation is made and even sing along. His story shows that with hard work, you can achieve big dreams in the movie industry.
